fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: 1. **Infiltrate**: Once per game, you can choose to secretly join one of the mafia factions for a single night, gaining access to their nighttime activities and information. You remain undetectable to both factions during this time.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
1. **Stealthy Presence**: You cannot be targeted or killed by any faction during the night phases unless you actively choose to infiltrate a faction.
2. **Double Agent**: You win if both the mafia and the town are eliminated, regardless of which faction orchestrates the kills.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Your goal is to survive until the end of the game while ensuring both the mafia and the town lose. (brainless)
